name: Jiguso - Demo
description:
Synopsis

Kyle, along with six unfamiliar individuals, awakens in an abandoned hotel waiting room. The rules of the game are simple: complete jigsaw puzzles to escape. There's something sinister about the killer though, and it seems unlikely any of them are meant to make it out alive.

Information

This game features a single ending plus game overs and no story choices. You can change the difficulty of the Jigsaw puzzles if you want.

Background

This game is inspired by Danganronpa, Saw and Ubel but rest assured that this is an original story with my own characters.

Created with RPG Maker VX Ace.

F5 to toggle fullscreen. F6 to change window size.
